detail_desc: Spacious handbag in sturdy imitation leather with two handles, and a magnetic fastener at the top and a decorative strap with a covered metal fastener at the front. Two inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Unlined. Size 15.5x32x36.5 cm.

Handbag in imitation leather with quilted sides, two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. The bag is divided into three compartments, the central one of which has a zip. Two small inner compartments at each side of the bag. Lined. Size 12x25.5x34 cm.
